channel.title: Docs on Pathivu
channel.description: Recent content in Docs on Pathivu

item.title: Query
item.description: Pathivu currently support query like selection, average, distinct and count. If you would like to see more query features, please feel free to open an issue

item.title: Deployment
item.description: Pathivu can be deployed in all kind of environmets like bare metal, kubernetes…

item.title: Katch CLI
item.description: Katchi is a cli tool to query pathivu server.
